PredatorBehavior Class Reference

Base Predator behavior class. Behaviors don't associate themselves with a specific state. That is up to the BehaviorFamily to associate a Behavior with an animal state. More...

#include <PredatorBehavior.h>

 Special method used for updating when a Predator has been noticed by a Prey.

Detailed Description

Base Predator behavior class. Behaviors don't associate themselves with a specific state. That is up to the BehaviorFamily to associate a Behavior with an animal state.

const std::list< Prey * > &  movedPrey,
const std::list< Prey * > &  stateChangedPrey 
) [pure virtual]

Update the associated Owner using the Behavior.

Parameters:
owner The Predator using the Behavior.
